author: Microsoft
description:
The International Federation of Red Cross (IFRC) and Red Crescent Societies is equipping national societies with digital tools and training to accelerate humanitarian response, improve operational efficiency, and save more lives.

The Costa Rica Red Cross (CRRC) is embracing this transformation by leveraging new digital fundraising solutions—including an online donation portal and real-time data analytics dashboards. These tools are helping CRRC strengthen its fundraising efforts and ensure resources are directed where they’re needed most. This ongoing digital evolution empowers CRRC to respond faster and more effectively during emergencies, making a meaningful difference in communities across the country.

title: Empowering Red Cross with digital tools to help save more lives
